item.title: Evenings only Software Testing (Software QA) Course
item.description: ISTQB training evenings only course in Software Testing starts November 22, 2011. Evenings only course held from 6 pm to 9 pm, Tuesday and Thursday. There will be 7 sessions plus 1 session for completing the ISTQB Foundation Level Certification.

item.title: Create E-Commerce Websites with Drupal & PHP
item.description: 12 week daytime training course starting January 2012. Create E-Commerce Websites with Drupal and PHP.

item.title: Create E-Commerce Websites with Drupal
item.description: 12 week evenings only training course starting January 2012. Create E-Commerce Websites with Drupal. Two evenings per week.

item.title: Advanced Programming for the Android Platform Using Java Training
item.description: Evening course in Advanced Programming for the Android Platform Using Java, starting soon.

item.title: Internet Application Development with Java, MySQL and AJAX Training Course
item.description: Full time 12 week course. Starting soon. OSAP eligible.

item.title: Internet Application Development with PHP, MySQL and AJAX
item.description: Hands-on training course in PHP, MySQL and AJAX, starting soon. OSAP eleigible.

item.title: Advanced Topics in Java Training
item.description: Evenings only training in advanced Java. Starts soon. 10 sessions, twice weekly.

item.title: Mobile Development using Android and Java Training Course
item.description: Mobile Development using Android and Java, starts soon. This will be a 12 week full-time course.

item.title: Struts 2 Training
item.description: Evenings only training in Struts 2. Starts soon. Twice per week, Mondays and Wednesdays, 6 pm to 9 pm. 10 sessions.
